column1: Apply this rule with provided coupons only. Comma separated. Create coupon in Promotions / Shopping Cart Rules area first."
column2: Apply this rule with coupon only. Create coupon in Promotions / Shopping Cart Rules area first."

column1: Apply this rule with ANY coupon from specified discount rules. Create rule in Promotions / Shopping Cart Price Rules area first. Useful when you have MULTIPLE coupons in one rule."
column2: Apply this rule with ANY coupon from specified discount rule. Create rule in Promotions / Shopping Cart Price Rules area first. Useful when you have MULTIPLE coupons in one rule."

column1: Not apply this rule with provided coupons. Comma separated. Create coupon in Promotions / Shopping Cart Rules area first."
column2: Not apply this rule with coupon. Create coupon in Promotions / Shopping Cart Rules area first."

column1: Not apply the rule with ANY coupon from specified discount rules. Create coupon in Promotions / Shopping Cart Price Rules area first. Useful when you have MULTIPLE coupons in one rule."
column2: Not apply the rule with ANY coupon from specified discount rule. Create coupon in Promotions / Shopping Cart Price Rules area first. Useful when you have MULTIPLE coupons in one rule."

column1: Leave empty or select all to apply the rule every day
column2: Leave empty or select all to apply the rule every day

column1: Leave empty or select all to apply the rule to any store
column2: Leave empty or select all to apply the rule to any store
